column1: Local Foods////Im famous among my friends for having too many "favorites"
column2: but this really is one of my absolute
column3: all-time FAVORITES! I have never had something I haven't liked from Local Foods. Whether catered
column6: the food is great all ways. I love the ability to convert any of their sandwiches into salads as that adds so many salad options. And when I'm ordering sandwiches
column7: I always get pretzel bread because it is to die for. Â
